name: Robo Crush
description:
Hello Valued Employee:

Within the new initiative to increase workspace productivity, all employees responsible for waste destructions are now authorized to use remote controls to pilot trash produced by the facilities to the nearest crusher.

Your Efficiency: 0.00004%

Company Quota: 90.99999%

Keep up the good work, valued employee.  Remember, failture to meet Company Quota will result in TERMINATION, and your remains will be passed on to the next employee to dispose of.

Keep up the satisfactory work,

Big Boss

This game was created for the Rolling Jam.

Controls:

  • Move with WASD
  • Jump with LMB or Space.
  • Launch Cannon with LMB
  • Reset level with R

All art created from scratch whithin blender.  Music found online.
